activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as the initial screen of the application. It checks if the intent action is `ACTION_VIEW` and if the intent data is not null. If both conditions are met, it starts `MainActivity` with the same action and data. Otherwise, it starts `MainActivity` without any additional data. After starting the appropriate activity, `SplashActivity` is finished.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the root layout coordinating the placement of other UI elements in the activity.
provides search functionality within the file manager, allowing users to quickly locate files or directories.
holds the main content of the activity, including the ViewPager and TabLayout.
allows switching between different fragments (ItemsFragment, RecentsFragment, StorageFragment) by swiping or selecting tabs.

serves as the root layout coordinating the placement of other UI elements in the activity.
provides search functionality within the file manager, allowing users to quickly locate files or directories.
holds the main content of the activity, including the ViewPager and TabLayout.
allows switching between different fragments (ItemsFragment, RecentsFragment, StorageFragment) by swiping or selecting tabs.

activities.summary: The MainActivity in the Simple Mobile Tools File Manager Pro is the central activity responsible for managing file operations, navigation, and UI customizations. It handles file browsing, favorites management, view and column count adjustments, sorting, and various configurations such as storage permissions, root access, and password protection. The activity also manages fragments for different views (ItemsFragment, RecentsFragment, StorageFragment) and provides functionalities for launching settings, about information, and handling intents for file selection and creation.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.MimeTypesActivity
activities.summary: The MimeTypesActivity is responsible for displaying and managing files based on their MIME types. It includes functionalities such as sorting and displaying files in a RecyclerView, changing the view type (grid or list), adjusting column counts in grid view, searching, toggling filename and hidden file visibility, and managing file deletion. The activity also supports zoom functionality in grid view and provides a customizable toolbar with various options for user interaction.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.ReadTextActivity

dynamic_property.effect: provides a container for coordinating the layout and behavior of child views in the activity.
displays a toolbar with a menu for accessing actions like search, save, and print.
wraps the main content and search functionality in a vertical linear layout.
includes a search bar layout for text search functionality within the activity.
holds the text content in a scrollable view for easy navigation.
displays and allows editing of the text content, with support for multi-line input and text search highlighting.

activities.summary: The `ReadTextActivity` is designed to handle the reading, editing, and searching of text content from a file or URI. It provides functionality to display text in a `GestureEditText`, search for specific text within the content, navigate between search results, save the text to a file, and print the text using a WebView. The activity also manages the UI for text editing, including handling search activation, closing search, and managing unsaved changes when navigating back.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.PDFViewerActivity

dynamic_property.effect: Wraps the PDF viewer and app bar, enabling scrolling behavior coordinated with the app bar.

Provides a visual shadow effect at the top of the screen, enhancing UI aesthetics.
Serves as the app bar container, dynamically adjusting its height and padding based on device configuration and navigation bar position.
Provides navigation controls, including a back button and a menu for actions like printing, with dynamic UI adjustments based on orientation and screen size.

activities.summary: The PDFViewerActivity is designed to display and interact with PDF files. It handles loading PDFs, managing UI elements like the toolbar and app bar, supporting full-screen mode, handling device configuration changes, and providing printing functionality. It also supports device features like notches and dynamically adjusts the layout based on screen orientation and navigation bar position.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.DecompressActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the root layout for coordinating the activity's views and interactions.

displays the list of files and directories within the ZIP file, allowing users to navigate and decompress the contents.

displays the list of files and directories within the ZIP file, allowing users to navigate and decompress the contents.

activities.summary: The DecompressActivity is responsible for decompressing ZIP files. It allows users to select a ZIP file, navigate its contents, and decompress it to a chosen destination. The activity handles password-protected ZIP files, ensures secure decompression by checking for path traversal vulnerabilities, and manages UI updates for navigation and file listing. It also supports background decompression and provides user feedback via toast messages.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.SaveAsActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the root layout for the activity, managing the positioning and behavior of child views.
displays the title 'Save As' and provides a navigation icon for returning to the previous screen.

serves as the root layout for the activity, managing the positioning and behavior of child views.
displays the title 'Save As' and provides a navigation icon for returning to the previous screen.
holds and organizes the main content of the activity, such as file selection and saving UI elements.

activities.summary: The `SaveAsActivity` is responsible for saving files sent via intents. It processes incoming intents with the `ACTION_SEND` action, opens a `FilePickerDialog` to select a destination for the file, and saves the file to the chosen location. It notifies the user of the success or failure of the operation. If the intent does not match the required criteria, it displays an error toast and finishes the activity.

activities.summary: The SettingsActivity is responsible for managing various app settings, including color customization, language preferences, security features (like password protection), file operations, and UI behaviors (like font size and pull-to-refresh). It provides a centralized interface for users to configure the app according to their preferences.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.FavoritesActivity

activities.summary: The FavoritesActivity allows users to manage their favorite files and directories. Users can add new favorites by selecting files or directories through a FilePickerDialog. The activity updates the UI to reflect changes in the favorites list, including displaying a placeholder message when the list is empty. It also provides a toolbar with options to manage favorites and navigation.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.AboutActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to display information about the app, including version details, developer credits, and links to related resources.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.CustomizationActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for customizing various settings and preferences in the application, such as themes, colors, and other user interface elements.
